original_text: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.
korean_text: 악인은 입술의 허물로 말미암아 그물에 걸려도 의인은 환난에서 벗어나느니라

sentences.original_text: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips
sentences.korean_translation: 악인은 자기 입술의 범죄로 인해 올무에 걸린다

sentences.original_text: but the just shall come out of trouble
